Items.Title: Oversight - Election Reform and Modernization: Considering Early Voting, Same-day Voter Registration and Electronic Voter Registration
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Election Reform and Modernization: Considering Early Voting, Same-day Voter Registration and Electronic Voter Registration

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the State Legislature to amend the State election law to permit electronic voter registration.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: State Legislature to amend the State election law to permit electronic voter registration.

Items.Title: Resolution urging the New York State Legislature to pass A.4258 and S.5013, which allow for same day registration.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS State Legislature to pass A.4258 and S.5013, which allow for same day registration.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress and the New York State Legislature to pass legislation to allow early voting and no-excuse absentee ballots.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: State Legislature to pass legislation to allow early voting and no-excuse absentee ballots.

Items.Title: Oversight - Election Reform and Modernization: Considering Early Voting, Same-day Voter Registration and Electronic Voter Registration
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Election Reform and Modernization: Considering Early Voting, Same-day Voter Registration and Electronic Voter Registration

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the State Legislature to amend the State election law to permit electronic voter registration.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: State Legislature to amend the State election law to permit electronic voter registration.

Items.Title: Resolution urging the New York State Legislature to pass A.4258 and S.5013, which allow for same day registration.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS State Legislature to pass A.4258 and S.5013, which allow for same day registration.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress and the New York State Legislature to pass legislation to allow early voting and no-excuse absentee ballots.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: State Legislature to pass legislation to allow early voting and no-excuse absentee ballots.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Garodnick and Mark-Viverito
